note.p: Education: Merton College, Oxford (matriculated 1693); Leyden (admitted 1699); Utrecht; MD (1701); Trinity College, Dublin; MD (1702); Incorporated at Oxford (1708)
Career: Practised in Dublin; his library was given to Steevens Hospital, Dublin
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Foster; Innes Smith (gives name, incorrectly, as George)

Notes: Signature in Charter Book is ' E Worth' but it is indexed as 'G Worth'. Innes Smith says he is called George in RS records, but Edward is described in Utrecht register as 'Soc Reg Lond Socius'.
